feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [BHS7][Dedicated Servers] - Rooms B702/B703/B707/B709 maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 10, 10:00 - 20:00 UTC

Jan 13, 21:42 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our electrical infrastructure.

Start time : 10/03/2026 10:00 UTC
End time : 10/03/2026 20:00 UTC
Service impact : Some servers located in rooms B702, B703, B707 and B709 might be temporarily unavailable from 10:30 UTC during the maintenance .
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our electrical infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - Racks G121A06/G121A07
entry.content:
Feb 13, 20:04 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering, which was causing temporary availability issue in the racks G121A06 and G121A07 has been resolved.

Start time : 13/02/2026 09:33 UTC
End time : 13/02/2026 19:00UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Feb 13, 13:42 UTC
Identified - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Most servers are now up and running. A replacement of hardware is actually in progress, in order to restore the last servers.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Feb 13, 09:46 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering, which is causing temporary availability issue in the racks G121A06 and G121A07.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 13/02/2026 09:33 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : All servers in the racks G121A06 and G121A07 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their servers located on the specified racks
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
